instruction: Describe the character of the protagonist in the movie 'Pursuit of Happiness'.
output: The protagonist of the movie 'Pursuit of Happiness' is Chris Gardner, a single father struggling to make ends meet, who goes from homelessness to becoming a successful stockbroker. He is passionate, determined, and resilient in his pursuit of his dreams, despite the hardships he faces. He is a loving, devoted father and a hardworking, courageous role model.
